title: What are the advantages of assisted technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to World Health Organization, Assistive Technology is defined as "Any device or system that allows individuals to perform tasks they would otherwise be unable to do or increases the ease and safety with which tasks can be performed". So, its main intention is to help disabled and elderly people for running their day to day activity without much problem and without the help of the second person. Here are some benefit of assisted technology: It is a strong tool to enhance and improve individual independence and involvement.It enables individuals to move, communicate better, see, listen and take part in the activities.It promotes child rights.
As opposed to destructive technology? Any tool that makes your task easier of more productive is assisted technology unless you are thinking of some specific area of use.
